title: Freedom UI | Creatio Academy
content: This is documentation for Creatio 8.2 . For up-to-date documentation, see the latest version ( 8.3 ). Version: 8.2 Page customization Creatio AI Field Toggle panel Timeline Communication options Sidebar Selection window Dialog window System variable System setting Chats Word reports Emails Web service Additional feature User consent storage Open page Business rules Business processes Creatio zone Closing the WebSocket

For up-to-date documentation, see the **[latest version](/docs/8.x/dev/development-on-creatio-platform/freedom-ui-customization)** (8.3).
